Name: Illegal Dependency
Common Solution: Dependency Inversion: Create Protocol in Domain.

Name: Protected Member Access
Description: Outer layer accessing _member of inner layer.

Name: Naked Return
Description: Raw data object returned from Repository.

Name: Missing Abstraction
Description: UseCase holds reference to raw infra types.

Name: God File Violation
Description: File is too large or contains mixed layers.

Name: Deep Structure
Description: Module in project root instead of sub-package.
Common Solution: Organization: Move to core/ or layer.

Name: Defensive None Check
Common Solution: Validation: Validate at the Interface layer.

Name: Illegal I/O (Silent Core)
Common Solution: Telemetry Port: Inject a logger protocol.

Name: UI Concern in Domain
Description: ANSI codes or formatting in Domain logic.

Name: Layer Integrity
Description: File not mapped to a layer.

Name: Top-Level Functions
Description: Function exists outside of a Class.

Name: Unstable Dependency
Description: External library call that cannot be inferred.

Name: Private Method Test
Common Solution: Integration: Test via the public API.

Name: Contract Integrity
Description: Infra class not inheriting from Domain Protocol.
